findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.withdraw (FibonacciBalance.sol#26-33) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(calculatedFibNumber * 1000000000000000000) (FibonacciBalance.sol#32)
findings.name: arbitrary-send

findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.withdraw (FibonacciBalance.sol#26-33) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(fibSig,withdrawalCounter)) (FibonacciBalance.sol#31)
findings.name: controlled-delegatecall

findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.fallback (FibonacciBalance.sol#36-39) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(msg.data)) (FibonacciBalance.sol#38)
findings.name: controlled-delegatecall

findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.calculatedFibNumber (FibonacciBalance.sol#14) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- withdraw (FibonacciBalance.sol#26-33)
findings.name: uninitialized-state

findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.calculatedFibNumber should be constant (FibonacciBalance.sol#14)
FibonacciBalance.start should be constant (FibonacciBalance.sol#16)
findings.name: constable-states

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected @ FibonacciBalance.sol#19:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in FibonacciBalance.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (FibonacciBalance.sol#8): it allows old versions
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Low level call in FibonacciBalance.withdraw (FibonacciBalance.sol#26-33):
	-require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(fibSig,withdrawalCounter)) FibonacciBalance.sol#31
findings.name: low-level-calls

findings.message:
Low level call in FibonacciBalance.fallback (FibonacciBalance.sol#36-39):
	-require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(msg.data)) FibonacciBalance.sol#38
findings.name: low-level-calls

findings.message: Parameter '_fibonacciLibrary' of FibonacciBalance. (FibonacciBalance.sol#22) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention

findings.message: Parameter '_start' of FibonacciLib.setStart (FibonacciBalance.sol#49) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention
